name: Daily Duas
description: Essential duas for everyday situations and daily routine

duas.title: Upon Waking Up
duas.arabic: الْحَمْدُ لِلَّهِ الَّذِي أَحْيَانَا بَعْدَ مَا أَمَاتَنَا وَإِلَيْهِ النُّشُورُ
duas.transliteration: Alhamdu lillahi alladhi ahyana ba'da ma amatana wa ilayhin-nushur
duas.english: All praise is for Allah who gave us life after having taken it from us and unto Him is the resurrection.
duas.benefits: Thanking Allah for restoring life after sleep

duas.title: When Looking in the Mirror
duas.arabic: اللَّهُمَّ أَنْتَ حَسَّنْتَ خَلْقِي فَحَسِّنْ خُلُقِي
duas.transliteration: Allahumma anta hassanta khalqi fa hassin khuluqi
duas.english: O Allah, just as You have made my external features beautiful, make my character beautiful as well.
duas.benefits: Seeking beautiful character and inner beauty

duas.title: When Leaving the House
duas.arabic: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ تَوَكَّلْتُ عَلَى اللَّهِ وَلاَ حَوْلَ وَلاَ قُوَّةَ إِلاَّ بِاللَّهِ
duas.transliteration: Bismillahi tawakkaltu 'alallahi wa la hawla wa la quwwata illa billah
duas.english: In the name of Allah, I trust in Allah, and there is no might nor power except with Allah.
duas.benefits: Protection, guidance, and being spared from going astray

duas.title: When Entering the House
duas.arabic: اللَّهُمَّ إِنِّي أَسْأَلُكَ خَيْرَ الْمَوْلِجِ وَخَيْرَ الْمَخْرَجِ بِسْمِ اللَّهِ وَلَجْنَا وَبِسْمِ اللَّهِ خَرَجْنَا وَعَلَى اللَّهِ رَبِّنَا تَوَكَّلْنَا
duas.transliteration: Allahumma inni as'aluka khayral-mawliji wa khayral-makhraji bismillahi walajna wa bismillahi kharajna wa 'alallahi rabbina tawakkalna
duas.english: O Allah, I ask You for the best entering and the best exiting. In the name of Allah we enter, in the name of Allah we leave, and upon our Lord we depend.
duas.benefits: Blessing and protection for the home and family

duas.title: Before Using the Bathroom
duas.arabic: اللَّهُمَّ إِنِّي أَعُوذُ بِكَ مِنَ الْخُبُثِ وَالْخَبَائِثِ
duas.transliteration: Allahumma inni a'udhu bika minal-khubuthi wal-khaba'ith
duas.english: O Allah, I seek refuge with You from all evil and evil-doers.
duas.benefits: Protection from jinn and evil spirits

duas.title: After Using the Bathroom
duas.benefits: Seeking Allah's forgiveness and expressing gratitude

duas.title: When Wearing New Clothes
duas.arabic: اللَّهُمَّ لَكَ الْحَمْدُ أَنْتَ كَسَوْتَنِيهِ أَسْأَلُكَ خَيْرَهُ وَخَيْرَ مَا صُنِعَ لَهُ وَأَعُوذُ بِكَ مِنْ شَرِّهِ وَشَرِّ مَا صُنِعَ لَهُ
duas.transliteration: Allahumma lakal-hamdu anta kasawtanihi as'aluka khayrah wa khayra ma suni'a lah wa a'udhu bika min sharrih wa sharri ma suni'a lah
duas.english: O Allah, for You is all praise, You have clothed me with it. I ask You for the good of it and the good for which it was made, and I seek refuge with You from the evil of it and the evil for which it was made.
duas.benefits: Blessing and protection in wearing new clothes

duas.title: When Hearing Thunder
duas.arabic: سُبْحَانَ الَّذِي يُسَبِّحُ الرَّعْدُ بِحَمْدِهِ وَالْمَلاَئِكَةُ مِنْ خِيفَتِهِ
duas.transliteration: Subhanal-ladhi yusabbihur-ra'du bihamdih wal-mala'ikatu min khifatih
duas.english: Glory is to Him Whom thunder and angels glorify due to fear of Him.

duas.title: When Sneezing
duas.benefits: Thanking Allah and seeking His mercy

duas.title: When Someone Else Sneezes
duas.english: May Allah have mercy upon you.
duas.benefits: Seeking Allah's mercy for the person who sneezed
duas.occasion: When someone else sneezes and says Alhamdulillah

duas.title: When Feeling Afraid
duas.arabic: لاَ إِلَهَ إِلاَّ اللَّهُ وَحْدَهُ لاَ شَرِيكَ لَهُ لَهُ الْمُلْكُ وَلَهُ الْحَمْدُ وَهُوَ عَلَى كُلِّ شَيْءٍ قَدِيرٌ
duas.transliteration: La ilaha illa Allah wahdahu la shareeka lah, lahul-mulku wa lahul-hamdu wa huwa 'ala kulli shay'in qadeer
duas.english: None has the right to be worshipped except Allah, alone, without partner, to Him belongs all sovereignty and praise and He is over all things omnipotent.
duas.benefits: Removing fear and anxiety, bringing peace of heart
